Loading dependencies

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```



Reading in the .csv file:

```{r}
trials <- read.csv("gender_titles_pilot-trials.csv")
```


Defining groups for visualisation:

```{r}
real_trials <- trials %>%
  filter(id!="example1") %>%
  filter(familiarity!="unfamiliar")
```

```{r}
male_trials <- real_trials %>%
  filter(gender=="male")
```

```{r}
male_groupings <- male_trials %>%
  group_by(orthog) %>%
  summarise(ortho_mean = mean(response))
```

```{r}
female_trials <- real_trials %>%
  filter(gender=="female")
```

```{r}
female_groupings <- female_trials %>%
  group_by(orthog) %>%
  summarise(ortho_mean = mean(response))
```


```{r}
neutral_trials <- real_trials %>%
  filter(gender=="neutral")
```


```{r}
neutral_groupings <- neutral_trials %>%
  group_by(orthog) %>%
  summarise(ortho_mean=mean(response))
```



```{r}
ggplot(male_groupings, aes(x=orthog,y=ortho_mean)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  ylim(1,7) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```
```{r}
ggplot(female_groupings, aes(x=orthog,y=ortho_mean)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  ylim(1,7) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(neutral_groupings, aes(x=orthog,y=ortho_mean)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  ylim(1,7) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```


### Testing Grounds

```{r}
underlying <- real_trials %>%
  group_by(id,gender) %>%
  summarise(indi_mean = mean(response))
```

```{r}
ggplot(underlying, aes(x=id, y=indi_mean, color=gender)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45, hjust=1)) + 
  labs(x="Ungendered Lexical Item", y="Mean Rating", color = "Gender Seen", title="Mean Gender Rating by Ungendered Form and Genders Seen")
```
